about.summary: Provides function declarations and inline function definitions that facilitate communication between R and the 'Armadillo' 'C++' library for linear algebra and scientific computing. This implementation is detailed in Vargas Sepulveda and Schneider Malamud (2024) <doi:10.48550/arXiv.2408.11074>.

Provides function declarations and inline function definitions that facilitate communication between R and the 'Armadillo' 'C++' library for linear algebra and scientific computing. This implementation is detailed in Vargas Sepulveda and Schneider Malamud (2024) <doi:10.48550/arXiv.2408.11074>.

name: r-cpp11armadillo
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.5.2" %}

package:
  name: r-cpp11armadillo
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/cpp11armadillo_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/cpp11armadillo/cpp11armadillo_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: df756f7805b85e45ebd6f5a0e17fedc957c1d82213bcde4ff9e57c723f3f933d

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 0
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-cpp11
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-cpp11

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('cpp11armadillo')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('cpp11armadillo')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://pacha.dev/cpp11armadillo/
  dev_url: https://github.com/pachadotdev/cpp11armadillo
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE.md
  summary: Provides function declarations and inline function definitions that facilitate communication between R and the 'Armadillo' 'C++' library for linear algebra and scientific computing. This implementation is detailed in Vargas Sepulveda and Schneider Malamud (2024) <doi:10.48550/arXiv.2408.11074>.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

This implementation is detailed in Vargas Sepulveda and Schneider Malamud (2024) <doi:10.48550/arXiv.2408.11074>.
